{{Wireless embedded system |brand=WRTnode |model=2 |revision=R (MT7688A) |asin=B018RY1HRU |price=30 |is_manuf=Yes |availability=now |est_release_date=08/2015 |type=mini module, IoT board |pwr_v=3.3 |pwr_amp=0.3 |pwr_conn=Mini PCI |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7688AN |cpu1_cspeed=580 |fla1=32 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q256FVEM |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W972GG6JB-25 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI, USB 2.0 (pins) |expansion_minipci_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=1 |serial=yes |wi1_module=WRTnode 2R |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7688AN |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=5 |addl_chips=MCU (Cortex-M3);STMicro;STM32F103;STM32F103T8U6,,;1; |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.3;Ralink UBoot v4.3.0.0; |stock_os=Linux;3.18.23;OpenWrt Chaos Calmer 15.05; |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ip=192.168.8.1 }} {{TagLine|WRTnode 2R IoT Board (MT7688A)}} :[http://wrtnode.cc/html/hardware_2.html Product page] {{•}} [https://github.com/WRTnode WRTnode GitHub]
*[http://wiki.wrtnode.com/index.php?title=Main_Page ''WRTnode 1'' Wiki] {{•}} [http://wiki.wrtnode.cc/index.php?title=首页/en ''WRTnode 2'' Wiki]
====[[WRTnode 2R]]==== *SoC: [[MediaTek]] MT7688AN @580MHz ([[MIPS 24KEc]]) *Flash: 32MB (NOR), RAM: 256MB (DDR2) *WLAN: WiSoC 802.11bgn 1T1R (150Mbps) *MCU: ''STMicro'' STM32F103T8U6 (Cortex-M3) :;I/O's via Mini PCI connector: *CPU ([[MediaTek]] MT7688A): :1x PCIe X1, USB 2.0 host, SD-XC (for micro-SD) :2x UART, 20x GPIO, 4x PWM, SPI (master/slave) :5x FE (100Mbps) Ethernet, I2C, I2S (192K/24bit) *MCU ([[STMicro]] STM32F103): 5x ADC (12-bit) :26x GPIO, 10x PWM @36MHz, CAN, 3x Timer *Dimensions: 60 x 29 mm • [https://www.amazon.com/WRTnode-Openwrt-Devboard-Internet-Things/dp/B018RY1HRU B018RY1HRU]
===Reviews=== *[http://www.cnx-software.com/2015/08/17/wrtnode2p-wrtnode2r-and-wrtnodehi-openwrt-boards-to-feature-m-2-mini-pcie-edge-connectors-h-265-camera-support-and-more/ ''WRTnode Boards'' on '''CNX|Software''']
===See also=== :[[:Category:WRTnode|WRTnode]] *[[WRTnode]] 1 (MT7620N) *[[WRTnode (MT7620N)]] (EE) *[[WRTnode 2P]] (MT7628A) *[[WRTnode 2R]] (MT7688A) *[[WRTnode 2Q]] (QCA9531) *[[WRTnode Hi]] (Hi3516A)
